nodes.bodyText:
I'm not in favor of getting the name via the mirror.toString() at all. Can we go via the element somehow? I see somewhat up is the same construction.. (line 263)..
If not.. go ahead and merge.. I think I even investigated this before in the exact same spot 😄

We do that when the type is a declared type. Otherwise there is no element, there is only a TypeKind and we do use it then the type is primitive. Not sure if we can do more here.

I think I even investigated this before in the exact same spot 😄

We did this together for #1558
